casebody.data:
MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-0195. Greene v. Westfield Ins. Co.

Stark App. No. 2002CA00126, 2002-0hio-7210. On motion of appellant Travelers Casualty & Surety Co. to modify this court’s decision in Greene v. Westfield Ins. Co. (2003), 98 Ohio St.3d 1561, 2003-Ohio-2242, 787 N.E.2d 1227. Motion denied.

Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent.
